import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import './favseller.css'; class Favseller extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { vendorList : [], Favourite : 'Favourite', } this.fetchVendor = this.fetchVendor.bind(this); } componentDidMount(){ this.fetchVendor(); } fetchVendor(){ axios.post('http://localhost:4000/api/fetchVendorList',{ Favourite : this.state.Favourite, }).then((response)=>{ console.log('response',response.data.vendor); this.setState({ vendorList : response.data.vendor }) }) } render(){ console.log('shivendra',this.state.Favourite); return(

Favourite Seller

Mo Rashid
Neha Sharma
Kamal Gupta
Imran Khan
Heltan Mittal
Danish Khan
John Mark
) } } export default Favseller;
